data.title: The Step In Parenting (HC) (2023)
data.meta_description:
Ralph Pittman Jr. is a husband, father, actor, speaker, businessman, and entrepreneur. A native of New Brunswick, New Jersey, Pittman attended Rutgers University where he graduated with a bachelor's degree in Business Economics while also studying Music Theory. In 2014, Pittman married American Film and Television Actress, Drew Sidora and began a new life as a husband and bonus dad. After several years of navigating the peaks and valleys of co-parenting, Pittman realized there is a large community of parents that experience similar challenges.

With various parenting dynamics and no blueprint to ensure success, it led Pittman leveraged his experience to create The Step in Parenting in hopes of bridging the gap between blended families with sound advice and guidance. Today, Pittman resides in Atlanta, GA with his wife Drew and three kids, Josiah,11; Machai, 7; and Aniya Grace, 4.
data.text:
Ralph Pittman Jr. is a husband, father, actor, speaker, businessman, and entrepreneur. A native of New Brunswick, New Jersey, Pittman attended Rutgers University where he graduated with a bachelor's degree in Business Economics while also studying Music Theory. In 2014, Pittman married American Film and Television Actress, Drew Sidora and began a new life as a husband and bonus dad. After several years of navigating the peaks and valleys of co-parenting, Pittman realized there is a large community of parents that experience similar challenges.

With various parenting dynamics and no blueprint to ensure success, it led Pittman leveraged his experience to create The Step in Parenting in hopes of bridging the gap between blended families with sound advice and guidance. Today, Pittman resides in Atlanta, GA with his wife Drew and three kids, Josiah,11; Machai, 7; and Aniya Grace, 4.
